languages.text: Коварство обитателей Комморры заманило Вольного Торговца на бойцовскую арену Губительной жажды. Чтобы продолжить поиск пути на свободу е{mf|му|й} предстоит выжить в жестоком бою.

The deviousness of the denizens of Commorragh has lured the Rogue Trader to the arena of the Cult of the Fatal Thirst. To continue {mf|his|her} search for freedom, the Rogue Trader needs to survive a fierce battle.
languages.original_text: Коварство обитателей Комморры заманило Вольного Торговца на бойцовскую арену Губительной жажды. Чтобы продолжить поиск пути на свободу е{mf|му|й} предстоит выжить в жестоком бою.

traits.locale_text: The deviousness of the denizens of Commorragh has lured the Rogue Trader to the arena of the Cult of the Fatal Thirst. To continue {mf|his|her} search for freedom, the Rogue Trader needs to survive a fierce battle.

The deviousness of the denizens of Commorragh has lured the Rogue Trader to the arena of the Cult of the Fatal Thirst. To continue {mf|his|her} search for freedom, the Rogue Trader needs to survive a fierce battle.

The deviousness of the denizens of Commorragh has lured the Rogue Trader to the arena of the Cult of the Fatal Thirst. To continue {mf|his|her} search for freedom, the Rogue Trader needs to survive a fierce battle.

languages.text: La perfidie des habitants de Commorragh a attiré {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} jusque dans l'arène du Culte de la Soif Fatale. Pour continuer sa quête de liberté, {mf|il|elle} va devoir survivre à un combat acharné.
languages.original_text: The deviousness of the denizens of Commorragh has lured the Rogue Trader to the arena of the Cult of the Fatal Thirst. To continue {mf|his|her} search for freedom, the Rogue Trader needs to survive a fierce battle.

traits.locale_text: La perfidie des habitants de Commorragh a attiré {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} jusque dans l'arène du Culte de la Soif Fatale. Pour continuer sa quête de liberté, {mf|il|elle} va devoir survivre à un combat acharné.

languages.text: 科摩罗的居民设下了狡猾的陷阱，将行商浪人引诱到了“致命饥渴”教派的竞技场。为了重获自由，行商浪人需要在激烈的战斗中存活下来。
languages.original_text: The deviousness of the denizens of Commorragh has lured the Rogue Trader to the arena of the Cult of the Fatal Thirst. To continue {mf|his|her} search for freedom, the Rogue Trader needs to survive a fierce battle.

traits.locale_text: 科摩罗的居民设下了狡猾的陷阱，将行商浪人引诱到了“致命饥渴”教派的竞技场。为了重获自由，行商浪人需要在激烈的战斗中存活下来。

languages.text: コモラフの住人たちの悪巧みによって、自由開拓者は「宿命の渇き」教団の闘技場へと誘われた。自由開拓者が自由を求めて旅を続けるには、熾烈な戦いを生き抜く必要がある。
languages.original_text: The deviousness of the denizens of Commorragh has lured the Rogue Trader to the arena of the Cult of the Fatal Thirst. To continue {mf|his|her} search for freedom, the Rogue Trader needs to survive a fierce battle.

traits.locale_text: コモラフの住人たちの悪巧みによって、自由開拓者は「宿命の渇き」教団の闘技場へと誘われた。自由開拓者が自由を求めて旅を続けるには、熾烈な戦いを生き抜く必要がある。

languages.text: Die Heimtücke der Bewohner von Commorragh hat {mf|den Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} in die Arena des Kults des Fatalen Dursts gelockt. Um {mf|seine|ihre} Suche nach Freiheit fortzusetzen, muss {mf|der Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} einen wilden Kampf überleben.
languages.original_text: The deviousness of the denizens of Commorragh has lured the Rogue Trader to the arena of the Cult of the Fatal Thirst. To continue {mf|his|her} search for freedom, the Rogue Trader needs to survive a fierce battle.

traits.locale_text: Die Heimtücke der Bewohner von Commorragh hat {mf|den Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} in die Arena des Kults des Fatalen Dursts gelockt. Um {mf|seine|ihre} Suche nach Freiheit fortzusetzen, muss {mf|der Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} einen wilden Kampf überleben.

languages.text: La astucia de los habitantes de Commorragh ha atraído a{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente a la arena del Culto de la Sed Letal. Para seguir buscando la libertad, {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente deberá sobrevivir a una encarnizada batalla.
languages.original_text: The deviousness of the denizens of Commorragh has lured the Rogue Trader to the arena of the Cult of the Fatal Thirst. To continue {mf|his|her} search for freedom, the Rogue Trader needs to survive a fierce battle.

languages.text: Commorragh sakinlerinin aldatıcı sözleri, Hür Tacir'i Ölüme Susamışlığın Tarikatı'nın arenasına götürdü. Hür Tacir'in özgürlük arayışına devam edebilmesi için zorlu bir çatışmadan sağ çıkması gerekecek.
languages.original_text: The deviousness of the denizens of Commorragh has lured the Rogue Trader to the arena of the Cult of the Fatal Thirst. To continue {mf|his|her} search for freedom, the Rogue Trader needs to survive a fierce battle.
